name: Supermassive Games
detail: Supermassive Games is a British video game developer based in Guildford, England, United Kingdom. The company specialises in development for the PlayStation family of systems, only producing one title that was not released for a Sony console, and two that were not exclusives.

works.name: The Dark Pictures: Man of Medan / 黑相集：棉兰号
Until Dawn: Rush of Blood / 直到黎明 血腥突袭
